text: I cant remember if we had this discussion... can you use HubL variables in hubdb entries? For example im doing an event calendar and some of the events have the same name so I would want to make the `hs_path` have a different var in it
is there a way to not use the hs_path with the dynamic pages? for example instead have `<http://domain.com/page-with-hudb-code/[rowidnumber]|domain.com/page-with-hudb-code/[rowidnumber]>`
